name: YATZY BINGO Tournament
description:
Skill-based Bingo meets the classic board game YATZY!
The most famous classic dice game!

Welcome to the brand new board game, “YATZY BINGO Tournament”!
You can win Real World Rewards and Cash Prizes!

Simple gameplay with deep strategy that anyone can enjoy!
Roll the dice and fill the “Score Cell” to hit bingo on the game-board!
Get power-up items by making Bingo! Use your item wisely to get a higher score and win!

How to Play?
• Roll the 5 die and fill the score cell on the game-board.
• A bingo is created by scoring 4 cells in a straight, uninterrupted line. Each bingo awards Bonus Points and a Power-Up Item!
• Score all 12 cells and get higher score to win!

Simple yet challenging!
• Think carefully and wisely to win the game! Focus on Bingo or fill higher score cells to win.
• Use Power-Up Items as a strategic way to make YATZY or hit Bingo!

Compete with others and win prizes!
• Challenge people from all around the world.
• The player who finishes with the most points wins!

Prize tournaments are not available in the following states: AZ, AR, CT, DE, LA, MT, SC, SD, and TN. If you don’t live in a real prize-enabled region, you can still play for fun with our virtual currency.
